verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus, You're My Firm Foundation,
I Know I Can Stand Secure;
Jesus, You're My Firm Foundation,
I Put My Hope In Your Holy Word,
I Put My Hope In Your Holy Word.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have a Living Hope,
(I have a Living Hope, )
I Have a future;
(I Have a future;)
God Has A Plan For Me,
(God Has A Plan For Me,)
Of This I'm Sure,
(Of This I'm Sure.)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Your Word is Faithful,
(Your Word is Faithful,)
Mighty in Power;
(Mighty in Power;)
God has deliver Me,
(God has deliver Me,)
Of This I'm Sure,
(Of This I'm Sure.)
